title: China welcomes U.S. to visit China to discuss trade
text:
April 22, 2018 / 5:14 AM / Updated 44 minutes ago China welcomes U.S. to visit China to discuss trade Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
BEIJING (Reuters) - China on Sunday said it welcomed plans by top U.S. officials to visit the country to discuss trade and economic issues, amid   economies. FILE PHOTO - Flags of U.S. and China are placed for a meeting between Secretary of Agriculture Sonny Perdue and China's Minister of Agriculture Han Changfu at the Ministry of Agriculture in Beijing, China June 30, 2017.
